20110125082352.000|20110125082354.000|CC1|CAMP AND ALL THAT SORT OF STUFF?
20110125082354.000|20110125082354.000|CC1|>> I DO.                        
20110125082354.000|20110125082356.000|CC1|I HIKE A LOT.                   
20110125082356.000|20110125082357.000|CC1|ACTUALLY, MY SISTER AND I JUST  
20110125082357.000|20110125082358.000|CC1|DID A FIVE-DAY TREK IN THE      
20110125082358.000|20110125082401.000|CC1|EASTERN SIERRAS, THE TWO OF US. 
20110125082401.000|20110125082402.000|CC1|>> Dave: OH, MY GOD.

20110125082419.000|20110125082420.000|CC1|MY SISTER IS REALLY GOOD AT THAT
